title: blacklist websites
extract: Definition of: blacklist (1) A list of email addresses or domains of known spammers. ... A website can be placed on a blacklist because it is a fraudulent operation or because it exploits browser vulnerabilities to send spyware and other unwanted software to the user. Contrast with whitelist.
